shows.title: Silent Disco
shows.desc:
From small beginnings in East London, Sink The Pink has grown to become one of the UK’s most recognised and progressive queer nights. Its dedication to freedom of expression and good times has attracted a huge range of audiences. Come and join the fun: strut your stuff to pop, party and disco courtesy of some of the UK’s hottest DJs.
Meanwhile, Resis’Dance organise amazing party nights where gender norms are challenged and the voices of women of colour, working class and trans women are prioritised. But all are welcome to join the party.
